titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for the vessel Kalena.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S562)

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with an amendment. With written report No. 103-73.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 114.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
